alert.note: Alert for Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 4:19AM CDT until July 23 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rock Island County in northwestern Illinois... Western Whiteside County in northwestern Illinois... Northeastern Scott County in east central Iowa... Southeastern Clinton County in east central Iowa... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 418 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rock Creek Marina and Campground, or 7 miles southwest of Clinton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Morrison, Camanche, Fulton, Prophetstown, Erie, Garden Plain, Albany, Princeton, Cordova, Lyndon, Low Moor, East Clinton, Union Grove, Ustick, Fenton, Hillsdale, Portland Corners, Folletts and Spring Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
